Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Rolls Royce Silver Ghost
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
The Rolls-Royce Silver Ghost, introduced in 1906, is often regarded as one of the most iconic and luxurious cars of the early 20th century. Powered by a 7.0-liter six-cylinder engine, the Silver Ghost was renowned for its smooth performance, reliability, and quiet operation, earning it the nickname "the best car in the world."

Consumes a lot of fuel, and is best used for short to medium distances.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Passenger x1
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
